project_descr: The Project aims to strengthen co-ordination mechanisms between federal and the participating states and LGAs; established, effective and functional community based participatory disease survelliance network for Avian Influenza

outputs.output_descr: Coordination mechanism of Human Influenza Pandemic strengthened among Federal, State and Local Government levls; Functional community participatory diseases surveillance network and methodologies and tools for bio-security in place.

project_title: capacity for national prevention for ahi
